checks.error_message: Autoplay is used on media
checks.repair_technique: Provide options to pause/stop or control the volume of the media or ensure it does not last for more than 3 seconds

checks.error_message: Default controls used on media
checks.repair_technique: Default Controls provided by some browsers are not accessible. Provide custom controls that are accessible.

checks.error_message: Insufficient contrast between text foreground and background
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 4.5:1 and 3:1 for large text

checks.error_message: Element background color not set when text color is specified
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that foreground color and background both are defined; or both are not defined (neither direct nor through ancestor)

checks.error_message: Element text color not set when background color is specified
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that foreground color and background both are defined; or both are not defined (neither direct nor through ancestor)

checks.error_message: Background image is used
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that foreground color and background image have sufficient color contrast

checks.error_message: One or more components fail to satisfy the minimum color contrast
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 4.5:1 and 3:1 for large text

checks.error_message: One or more components fail to satisfy the minimum color contrast
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 4.5:1 and 3:1 for large text

checks.error_message: One or more components fail to satisfy the minimum color contrast
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 4.5:1 and 3:1 for large text

checks.error_message: One or more components fail to satisfy the minimum color contrast in the datepicker
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 4.5:1 and 3:1 for large text

checks.error_message: One or more components fail to satisfy the minimum color contrast
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 4.5:1 and 3:1 for large text

checks.error_message: One or more components fail to satisfy the minimum color contrast
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 4.5:1 and 3:1 for large text

checks.error_message: Scrolling is disabled
checks.repair_technique: Set scrolling attribute to auto or remove the attribute

checks.error_message: Page does not allow resizing
checks.repair_technique: Make the following changes to allow proper resizing

checks.error_message: One or more elements may have images in place of text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that images of text have not been used; If used, replace all the images with equivalent text

checks.error_message: One or more elements may have images in place of text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that images of text have not been used; If used, replace all the images with equivalent text

checks.error_message: One or more elements may have images in place of text in the datepicker
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that images of text have not been used; If used, replace all the images with equivalent text

checks.error_message: One or more elements may have images in place of text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that images of text(except the CAPTCHA challenge) have not been used; If used, replace all the images with equivalent text

checks.error_message: One or more elements may have images in place of text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that images of text have not been used; If used, replace all the images with equivalent text

checks.error_message: Insufficient contrast between text foreground and background
checks.repair_technique: Minimum contrast ratio for small text should be 7:1 and 4.5:1 for large text

checks.error_message: Transparent element background
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that foreground color and background both are defined; or both are not defined (neither direct nor through ancestor)

checks.error_message: Text alignment is justified
checks.repair_technique: Do not create text layout that is fully justified (aligned to both the left and the right margins)

checks.error_message: Text alternative required for plug-in
checks.repair_technique: Provide a text alternative for the plug-in and make sure that it descibes the purpose of the content

checks.error_message: Element link may not be available through keyboard
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link to view the applet and to download the plug-in is available through keyboard

checks.error_message: Plug-in may not return focus to the parent window
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the plug-in provides a mechanism to return focus to the parent window

checks.error_message: Start/Stop/Pause buttons should be operable through keyboard
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that these button receive keyboard focus and can be operated using keyboard only

checks.error_message: Allow plug-in to be downloaded through keyboard
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the mechanism to download the plug-in is operable through keyboard

checks.error_message: Plug-in may be inaccessible
checks.repair_technique: Make the plug-in accessible. If it cannot be made accessible, make sure that alternate accessible content is provided.

checks.error_message: Missing Keyboard event handler
checks.repair_technique: For onclick event handlers add an associated onkeypress event handler or its equivalent

checks.error_message: Missing Keyboard event handler
checks.repair_technique: For onmousedown event handlers add an associated onkeydown event handler or its equivalent

checks.error_message: Missing Keyboard event handler
checks.repair_technique: For onmouseout event handlers add an associated onblur event handler or its equivalent

checks.error_message: Missing Keyboard event handler
checks.repair_technique: For onmouseover event handlers add an associated onfocus event handler or its equivalent

checks.error_message: Missing Keyboard event handler
checks.repair_technique: For onmouseup event handlers add an associated onkeyup event handler or its equivalent

checks.error_message: Missing Keyboard event handler
checks.repair_technique: For onmousemove event handlers add an equivalent keyboard specific event handler

checks.error_message: Missing Keyboard event handler
checks.repair_technique: Use onclick instead of ondblclick or add an equivalent keyboard specific event handler

checks.error_message: Slider does not receive keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid tabindex to the slider

checks.error_message: All functionality of slider cannot be completed using keyboard
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the slider can be fully operated using keyboard

checks.error_message: Appropriate keyboard interaction not provided for slider
checks.repair_technique: Provide missing keyboard interactions for the slider

checks.error_message: Appropriate keyboard interaction not provided for menubar
checks.repair_technique: Provide missing keyboard interactions for the menubar

checks.error_message: Appropriate keyboard interaction not provided for tree
checks.repair_technique: Provide missing keyboard interactions for the tree

checks.error_message: Datepicker does not receive keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid tabindex to the datepicker

checks.error_message: All functionality of datepicker cannot be completed using keyboard
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the datepicker can be fully operated using keyboard

checks.error_message: Appropriate keyboard interaction not provided for datepicker
checks.repair_technique: Provide missing keyboard interactions for the datepicker

checks.error_message: Datepicker field used
checks.repair_technique: Provide textual information about the date format to be entered

checks.error_message: All functionality of CAPTCHA cannot be completed using keyboard
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the CAPTCHA

checks.error_message: One or more elements of CAPTCHA do not receive keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid tabindex to the elements of the CAPTCHA

checks.error_message: Pause/stop/hide control does not receive keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid tabindex to the control

checks.error_message: Pause/stop/hide control cannot be activated using keyboard
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the controls can be activated using keyboard

checks.error_message: One or more elements do not receive keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid tabindex to the carousel elements

checks.error_message: Element does not recieve keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid tabindex to the element and make sure that the focus does not get trapped anywhere in the page

checks.error_message: Keyboard focus repeats on page
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the keyboard focus is not trapped on the mentioned element

checks.error_message: Element does not recieve keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Do not use this.blur() in onfocus event

checks.error_message: Element does not recieve keyboard focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid tabindex to the clickable element

checks.error_message: Dialog is missing focusable element
checks.repair_technique: Ensure that all dialogs (both modal and non-modal) have at least one focusable descendant element.

checks.error_message: Articles in feed are not focusable
checks.repair_technique: Make each article in feed focusable

checks.error_message: Presentation role used on interactive element or hidden from aria
checks.repair_technique: Do not use role="presentation" or aria-hidden="true"on visible focusable elements

checks.error_message: Term is used on interactive element
checks.repair_technique: Do not use the term role on interactive elements such as links/inputs/buttons. Doing so could prevent users of assistive technologies from interacting with those elements.

checks.error_message: Text is used on interactive element
checks.repair_technique: Do not use the text role on interactive elements such as links/inputs/buttons. Doing so could prevent users of assistive technologies from interacting with those elements.

checks.error_message: Text contains interactive elements
checks.repair_technique: Do not use the text role on ancestor of interactive elements such as links/inputs/buttons. Doing so could prevent users of assistive technologies from interacting with those elements.

checks.error_message: Keyboard focus gets trapped in the slider
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the slider

checks.error_message: Keyboard focus gets trapped in the menubar
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the menubar

checks.error_message: Keyboard focus gets trapped in the tree
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the menubar

checks.error_message: Keyboard focus gets trapped in the datepicker
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the datepicker

checks.error_message: Keyboard focus gets trapped in the CAPTCHA
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the CAPTCHA

checks.error_message: Keyboard focus gets trapped in the carousel
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the carousel

checks.error_message: Accesskey attribute contains single character value
checks.repair_technique: Modify the keyboard shortcut to include one or more non-printable keyboard keys (e.g. Ctrl, Alt,Shift)

checks.error_message: Page refresh is used with a timeout
checks.repair_technique: Set the redirection timeout to 0 or use a server side redirect

checks.error_message: marquee element used
checks.repair_technique: Provide option to control the scrolling or do not use the marquee tag

checks.error_message: blink element used
checks.repair_technique: Provide option to control the blinking or do not use the blink tag

checks.error_message: Movement of carousel restarting on its own
checks.repair_technique: Carousel movement should not start automatically after pausing, stopping or hiding

checks.error_message: Pause/stop/hide control ties up the user focus
checks.repair_technique: Provide keyboard mechanism to TAB out of the control

checks.error_message: Option to pause/stop/hide carousel not provided
checks.repair_technique: Provide mechanism to pause/stop/hide the carousel

checks.error_message: Page refresh is used with a timeout
checks.repair_technique: Set the redirection timeout to 0 or use a server side redirect

checks.error_message: Missing alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add an alt attribute to the image

checks.error_message: Alt attribute cannot be same as file name
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute that describes the image

checks.error_message: Alt attribute is placeholder text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute that describes the image

checks.error_message: Image has short alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Check that the alt attribute conveys the meaning/purpose of the image

checks.error_message: Alt attribute of image is verbose
checks.repair_technique: Check that a long value of alt attribute is required to convey the information in the image

checks.error_message: Alt attribute text may not describe the functional purpose of the image
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the alt attribute describes the purpose of its parent a or button element

checks.error_message: Images without an alt attribute cannot have an empty longdesc attribute
checks.repair_technique: Provide meaningful text to the longdesc attribute that describes the image

checks.error_message: Longdesc attribute may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the longdesc attribute describes the image

checks.error_message: Alt attribute of image may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the alt attribute conveys the information present in the image

checks.error_message: Alt text of image used as link cannot be empty when there is no text in the anchor
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute of the image or provide text inside the parent a that describes the image or purpose of the anchor

checks.error_message: Anchor text may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the text in the parent a of the image describes the purpose of the anchor

checks.error_message: Blank alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid text to the alt attribute of the image unless the image is for decorative purpose only

checks.error_message: Alt text of image used as link cannot be same as the text in the adjacent anchor
checks.repair_technique: Merge the adjacent anchors

checks.error_message: Image has both alt & title attribute
checks.repair_technique: Remove the title attribute of the image

checks.error_message: Alt text of image used as link cannot be same as the text in anchor
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute of the image that is different than the anchor text

checks.error_message: Blank alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: If the image is not being used for decorative purpose, use the alt attribute in place of title attribute

checks.error_message: Image has both alt & title attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add any extra information in title to the alt attribute and remove the title attribute of the image

checks.error_message: Title used in place of alt
checks.repair_technique: Use alt attribute instead of title attribute

checks.error_message: Blank alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Provide meaningful text to the alt attribute of the image

checks.error_message: Image having longdesc has blank or missing alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful alt attribute to the image

checks.error_message: Server side image map used
checks.repair_technique: Replace it with an equivalent client side image map or provide alternative text based anchors that carry out the same task as image map

checks.error_message: Image map hotspot missing alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add an alt attribute to the image map hotspot

checks.error_message: Image map hotspot having blank alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid text to the alt attribute of the image map hotspot

checks.error_message: Alt attribute of image map hotspot may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the alt attribute describes the portion of the image map referenced by the hotspot

checks.error_message: Image map hotspot to a sound file must have a text transcript
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that an equivalent link to a text transcript of the sound file exists in the document

checks.error_message: Image map hotspot missing title
checks.repair_technique: Add a meaningful title to the image map hotspot

checks.error_message: Image map hotspot has duplicate alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a unique text to the alt attribute of the image map hotspot

checks.error_message: Applet may not have a text equivalent
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that applet has a text equivalent in its alt attribute

checks.error_message: Text equivalent for applet may not update when applet updates
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the text equivalent for applet updates when applet updates

checks.error_message: Applet user interface may not be accessible
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that applet user interface is accessible

checks.error_message: Text equivalent for object may not update when object updates
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the text equivalent for object updates when applet updates

checks.error_message: Object user interface may not be accessible
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that object user interface is accessible

checks.error_message: Missing object title
checks.repair_technique: Add a title attribute to the object

checks.error_message: Blank object title
checks.repair_technique: Add text to the title attribute of the object

checks.error_message: Object does not have a text alternative
checks.repair_technique: Provide a text alternative in the content of the object

checks.error_message: Missing noembed element
checks.repair_technique: Add a noembed element for the embed element containing equivalent text

checks.error_message: Blank noembed element
checks.repair_technique: Add a text equivalent of the embed element inside the noembed

checks.error_message: noembed may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the noembed element describes the embed element

checks.error_message: embed must have alt attribute.
checks.repair_technique: Add an alt attribute to the element

checks.error_message: embed must not have empty Alt text.
checks.repair_technique: Add text to the alt attribute of the element

checks.error_message: Image has been added using CSS
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the image is for decorative purpose only. If the image contains information, use img tag instead.

checks.error_message: Form control has no associated label or title
checks.repair_technique: Add a unique label for the form control or specify the title attribute

checks.error_message: Form control has more than one labels associated
checks.repair_technique: Remove all associated label elements except one

checks.error_message: Empty or missing label text
checks.repair_technique: Add some valid, meaningful text to the label element that describes the form control

checks.error_message: Empty or missing title text
checks.repair_technique: Add some valid, meaningful text to the title attribute that describes the form control

checks.error_message: Incorrect label position
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the associated label is positioned after the form control

checks.error_message: Incorrect label position
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the associated label is positioned before the form control

checks.error_message: Missing value attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a value attribute to the form control

checks.error_message: Blank value attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid text to the value attribute of the form control

checks.error_message: Missing alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add an alt attribute to the form control

checks.error_message: Blank alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid text to the alt attribute of the form control

checks.error_message: Alt attribute is placeholder text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute that describes the form control image

checks.error_message: Label text may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the associated label text describes the form control or its purpose

checks.error_message: Title attribute text may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the title attribute text describes the form control or its purpose

checks.error_message: Value attribute text may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the value attribute text describes the form control or its purpose

checks.error_message: Alt attribute text may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the alt attribute text describes the form control image or its purpose

checks.error_message: Alt attribute cannot be same as file name
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute that describes the form control image

checks.error_message: Incorrect label position
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the associated label is positioned after the form control

checks.error_message: Incorrect label position
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the associated label is positioned before the form control

checks.error_message: Form control has both label and title associated with it
checks.repair_technique: Add any extra information in title to the label and remove the title attribute

checks.error_message: Label is implicitly associated to the input field
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the label is explicitly associated to the form control

checks.error_message: Label is implicitly associated to the input field
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the label is explicitly associated to the form control

checks.error_message: Button has no text or title
checks.repair_technique: Add a unique text to the button or specify the title attribute

checks.error_message: Button has placeholder title
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the title attribute

checks.error_message: Button has placeholder text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the button

checks.error_message: Image in the button is missing alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add an alt attribute to the image

checks.error_message: Image in the button has blank alt attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid text to the alt attribute of the image

checks.error_message: Form control has both label and title associated with it
checks.repair_technique: Remove the title attribute

checks.error_message: Image in the button is having alt attribute as placeholder text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute that describes the purpose of the button

checks.error_message: Image in the button has alt attribute same as file name
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the alt attribute that describes the purpose of the button

checks.error_message: Location of alternate version of CAPTCHA not described in the text alternative
checks.repair_technique: The text alternative for CAPTCHA should describe the location of the alternate version of the CAPTCHA

checks.error_message: One or more elements missing purpose
checks.repair_technique: Provide text description of the purpose of each element

checks.error_message: No option to replay the audio CAPTCHA
checks.repair_technique: Provide means to replay the audio CAPTCHA; e.g a button or a link

checks.error_message: Alternate version of CAPTCHA missing
checks.repair_technique: Provide an accessible alternative to the image based CAPTCHA; e.g. sound based CAPTCHA

checks.error_message: Alt text for one or more images is blank.
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the images are for decorative purpose only

checks.error_message: Alt text for images may not be describing their purpose
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the alt attribute for images conveys the information present in them

checks.error_message: Missing text transcripts for any audio-only media
checks.repair_technique: Write text transcripts or place text transcript, or link to it, close to the media

checks.error_message: Missing text transcripts for any video-only media
checks.repair_technique: Provide text transcripts for any video-only media, close to the media

checks.error_message: Missing audio track for video only media
checks.repair_technique: Record an audio-track for any video-only media

checks.error_message: Captions for pre-recorded audio for synchronized media are missing
checks.repair_technique: Provide captions using track kind="captions"

checks.error_message: Description of video for synchronized media is missing
checks.repair_technique: Provide description using track kind="descriptions"

checks.error_message: Missing captions for the live video content
checks.repair_technique: Add captions to live video, probably through a content management system and to identify live video use hls or live or m3u8 in streaming files

checks.error_message: Missing Audio description
checks.repair_technique: Provide audio description in multiple languages using SMIL(Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language)

checks.error_message: Missing equivalent media alternative
checks.repair_technique: Provide appropriate text alternative in multiple languages using SMIL(Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language)

checks.error_message: Page heading hierarchy is not meaningful
checks.repair_technique: First heading in the page should always be h1

checks.error_message: More than one heading level 1 are present on the page
checks.repair_technique: Confirm if more than one h1 are required

checks.error_message: Page has no headings
checks.repair_technique: Use headings(h1 - h6) in a logical order to mark content

checks.error_message: Page must contain a level-one heading
checks.repair_technique: Use headings(h1) to mark content

checks.error_message: Blockquote should not be used for visual presentation purpose
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the text in blockquote is a quotation

checks.error_message: List should not be used for visual presentation purpose
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the list element represents an actual list and is not used for visual purpose only

checks.error_message: List content not marked up using list element
checks.repair_technique: Any content that is a direct child of list should be marked up using li element for ul, ol and dt, dd elements for dl

checks.error_message: Empty list items
checks.repair_technique: Do not use blank list items. If the purpose is to create spacing between items, use CSS.

checks.error_message: b (bold) element used
checks.repair_technique: Replace it with strong element; or use CSS to set font-weight, if meant for visual purpose only

checks.error_message: i (italic) element used
checks.repair_technique: Replace it with em element; or use CSS to set font-style, if meant for visual purpose only

checks.error_message: basefont element used
checks.repair_technique: Use CSS instead to set font on body, html

checks.error_message: font element used
checks.repair_technique: Use CSS instead to set font on elements

checks.error_message: Caption is blank
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful text to the caption of the table

checks.error_message: Missing summary
checks.repair_technique: Provide summary attribute of the table

checks.error_message: Blank summary
checks.repair_technique: Provide meaningful text to the summary attribute of the table

checks.error_message: Summary duplicates the caption
checks.repair_technique: summary should describe the table and should not be the same as caption

checks.error_message: Layout table contains caption
checks.repair_technique: Remove the caption element or make sure that the table is used to represent data

checks.error_message: Layout table contains summary
checks.repair_technique: Remove the summary attribute or make sure that the table is used to represent data

checks.error_message: Missing caption
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful caption to the table

checks.error_message: Complex table missing id & header for identification of cells
checks.repair_technique: Make sure all the th elements have 'id' attribute and all td elements refer to headers through 'header' attribute; or split the table into multiple simple tables if possible

checks.error_message: Table missing scope of row and column headers
checks.repair_technique: Mark the th elements with 'scope' attribute defining their scope (row or col)

checks.error_message: Caption is short
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful text to the caption of the table

checks.error_message: Caption is long
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful text to the caption of the table

checks.error_message: Summary is short
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful summary to the table

checks.error_message: Summary has placeholder text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful summary to the table

checks.error_message: Missing row and column headers
checks.repair_technique: Set role="presentation" if the table is used for layout purpose only

checks.error_message: Missing row and column headers
checks.repair_technique: Mark rows and columns using appropriate headers

checks.error_message: Heading is blank
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid text to the heading

checks.error_message: Heading text is short
checks.repair_technique: Check that heading text is valid

checks.error_message: Heading text is verbose
checks.repair_technique: Check that heading text is valid

checks.error_message: Heading does not follow a meaningful hierarchy
checks.repair_technique: Heading level should be h2

checks.error_message: Heading does not follow a meaningful hierarchy
checks.repair_technique: Heading level should be h2 or h3

checks.error_message: Heading does not follow a meaningful hierarchy
checks.repair_technique: Heading level should be h2 or h3 or h4

checks.error_message: Heading does not follow a meaningful hierarchy
checks.repair_technique: Heading level should be h2 or h3 or h4 or h5

checks.error_message: Heading is misused
checks.repair_technique: Do not use heading to provide style on text

checks.error_message: Items marked with menuitem role not owned by element with menu/menubar role
checks.repair_technique: Items marked with role=menuitem should have an element with role=menu or role=menubar as its parent

checks.error_message: Items marked with treeitem role not owned by element with tree role
checks.repair_technique: Items marked with role=treeitem should have an element with role=tree as its parent

checks.error_message: Datepicker column headers not marked properly
checks.repair_technique: Either use th to mark column headers or provide role=columnheader in the grid

checks.error_message: Inappropriate heading levels have been used
checks.repair_technique: Use headings(h1 h6) in a hierarchical order to mark content

checks.error_message: Grid is missing rows
checks.repair_technique: Provide role="row" on the following elements

checks.error_message: List is missing listitems
checks.repair_technique: Provide role="listitem" on the following elements

checks.error_message: Listbox is missing options
checks.repair_technique: Provide role="option" on the following elements

checks.error_message: Tabpanel not associated with respective tab
checks.repair_technique: Use the aria-labelledby attribute on the tab panel to reference the tab

checks.error_message: Element targeted by aria-activedescendant is not a descendant of the container
checks.repair_technique: Ensure that the element targeted by the aria-activedescendant attribute is either a descendant of the container in the DOM, or is a logical descendant as indicated by the aria-owns attribute.

checks.error_message: Parent role for element is missing
checks.repair_technique: Apply one the following roles as applicable to the logical or hierarchical parent of the element

checks.error_message: Blockquote should be used
checks.repair_technique: Use blockquote tag if the text is intended to be a quote

checks.error_message: Heading should be used
checks.repair_technique: Use proper heading ( h1 - h6 ) markup if the text is intended to be a heading

checks.error_message: Informational content has been added using CSS
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the content is relevant to styling only

checks.error_message: Radio button group not enclosed in a fieldset
checks.repair_technique: Place all radio buttons that are part of one group in a fieldset with a legend

checks.repair_technique: Place all checkboxes that are part of one group in a fieldset with a legend

checks.error_message: Fieldset should not be used for visual presentation purpose only

checks.error_message: Fieldset contains blank legend
checks.repair_technique: Add meaningful text to the legend in the fieldset

checks.error_message: Empty Paragraph

checks.error_message: Color is the only means of differentiating link and text
checks.repair_technique: Ensure that color is not the only visual means of differentiating link and plain text. Visual means such as underline, etc. may be used.

checks.error_message: Skip link description may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the skip link description describes its location

checks.error_message: Skip link destination missing on page
checks.repair_technique: Make sure the skip link points to a valid location in the page

checks.error_message: Skip link not navigating to the desired location
checks.repair_technique: Provide the id of the desired location as the href of the skip link

checks.error_message: Link may not skip to the main content
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the links skips to main content and the same is conveyed in the link text

checks.error_message: Skip to main content link is not the first focusable element on the page
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the skip to main content link is first to recieve focus on the page

checks.error_message: Skip link not visible
checks.repair_technique: Ensure that the skip link is either visible always or when it receives focus

checks.error_message: Page contains no skip links
checks.repair_technique: Provide links to skip over blocks of content

checks.error_message: Missing page title
checks.repair_technique: Add a titleto the page

checks.error_message: Page title is blank
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid text to the page title

checks.error_message: Page title text is short
checks.repair_technique: Check that the page title is valid

checks.error_message: Page title text is verbose
checks.repair_technique: Check that the page title is valid

checks.error_message: Page title is placeholder text
checks.repair_technique: Add a meaningful text to the page title

checks.error_message: Page title may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Check that the title of the page is descriptive and relevant to the contents of that page

checks.error_message: One or more elements do not appear in a meaningful sequence
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the focus order of elements is meaningful and hierarchical

checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the focus order of elements is meaningful and hierarchical

checks.error_message: One or more elements do not appear in a meaningful sequence
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the focus order of elements is meaningful and hierarchical

checks.error_message: Javascript link used
checks.repair_technique: Use a normal href attribute; unless necessary

checks.error_message: Empty link text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful text to the a element

checks.error_message: Link text may not be meaningful
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link text meaningfully describes its purpose and destination alone; or when read in context to its surrounding text

checks.error_message: Suspicious link text
checks.repair_technique: Check that the purpose of the link is conveyed through the description in the same sentence, list item, paragraph, table cell, table header associated with the link's cell in a data table, or heading preceding the link

checks.error_message: Link to a sound file must have a text transcript
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that an equivalent link to a text transcript of the sound file exists in the document

checks.error_message: Link has blank href attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid url in the href attribute or # if the link does not point to a url.

checks.error_message: Link is missing href attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid href attribute to the a element

checks.error_message: Link title replicates its text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful title to the a element that is different from its text

checks.error_message: Empty link text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a meaningful text to the a element

checks.error_message: One or more links in the menubar may not have meaningful text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link text meaningfully describes its purpose and destination

checks.error_message: One or more links in the tree may not have meaningful text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link text meaningfully describes its purpose and destination

checks.error_message: One or more links in the datepicker may not have meaningful text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link text meaningfully describes its purpose and destination

checks.error_message: One or more links in the CAPTCHA may not have meaningful text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link text meaningfully describes its purpose and destination

checks.error_message: One or more links in the carousel may not have meaningful text
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link text meaningfully describes its purpose and destination

checks.error_message: Multiple ways are not available to locate the web page within the set of web pages
checks.repair_technique: Provide at least any two of the following functionalities to locate a web page within the set of web pages: 1. Table of contents 2. Links to navigate to related web pages 3. Site map 4. Search mechanism 5. List of links to all the web pages

checks.error_message: Heading should be used
checks.repair_technique: Use proper heading ( h1 - h6 ) markup if the text is intended to be a heading

checks.repair_technique: Provide a visible focus using CSS outline property or by altering the foreground and background colors

checks.repair_technique: Provide a visible focus using CSS outline property or by altering the foreground and background colors

checks.error_message: One or more elements do not have a visible keyboard focus indicator
checks.repair_technique: Provide a visible focus using CSS outline property or by altering the foreground and background colors

checks.error_message: The Onscreen/Visible label does not match or start with the accessible lable
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the text of accessible label (provided using aria- label, label tag, title attribute) is same or starts with that of the Onscreen/Visible lable.

checks.error_message: Document language not defined
checks.repair_technique: Add lang attribute to the html element

checks.error_message: Document language is blank
checks.repair_technique: Add a language code to the lang attribute of the html element

checks.error_message: Document language may not be correct
checks.repair_technique: Check that the language code provided in the lang attribute of the htmlelement correctly represents the actual language of the page

checks.error_message: Document language may not be valid
checks.repair_technique: Add a valid 2 or 3 letter language code to the lang attribute of the html element

checks.error_message: Valid lang attribute is missing for the phrase or passage of text
checks.repair_technique: Lang attribute with appropriate value should be specified for the phrase or passage of text which is different than that of the default human language of the Web page

checks.error_message: Missing title of abbreviation
checks.repair_technique: Expanded form or meaning of the abbreviated term should be provided using title or any alternate means

checks.error_message: Blank title of abbreviation
checks.repair_technique: The title text should be an expanded form or meaning of the abbreviated term

checks.error_message: Form is missing a submit button
checks.repair_technique:
Make sure that the form is not being submitted on change of any input value.
Add an input of type submit towards the end of the form using which the form will be submitted.

checks.error_message: Form action not defined
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the data is not being submitted on change of any input value. Define an action for the form, to which the data will be submitted using a submit button.

checks.error_message: Form is missing a submit button
checks.repair_technique:
Make sure that the form is not being submitted on change of any input value.
Add an input of type submit towards the end of the form using which the form will be submitted.

checks.error_message: Link opens in a new window
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the link text contains information about the page opening in a new window.

checks.error_message: Input may cause a change of context
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that upon changing the input value, a change of context does not occur.

checks.error_message: Repeated links not consistent
checks.repair_technique: Check that repeated links have consistent link text across web pages

checks.error_message: Repeated images not consistent
checks.repair_technique: Repeated images should have the same alt text

checks.error_message: Page refresh is used with a timeout
checks.repair_technique: Set the redirection timeout to 0 or use a server side redirect

checks.error_message: Programmatic indication is not provided to identify mandatory/required fields
checks.repair_technique: Use HTML 'required' attribute or aria-required='true' or aria-invalid='true' to identify mandatory/required fields

checks.error_message: Programmatic indication provided but value field is blank
checks.repair_technique: Mandatory field should have some value .

checks.error_message: Description of alertdialog is missing
checks.repair_technique: Use aria-describedby on an alertdialog to reference the alert message element in the dialog

checks.error_message: Definition is missing a term
checks.repair_technique: Identify the element being defined by giving that element a role of term and referencing it with the aria-labelledby attribute.

checks.error_message: Missing dialog label
checks.repair_technique: Provide a dialog label, which can be done with the aria-label or aria-labelledby attribute

checks.error_message: Elements not marked with rowgroup role
checks.repair_technique: Provide role="rowgroup" on the following elements

checks.error_message: Elements not marked with group role
checks.repair_technique: Provide role="group" on the following elements

checks.error_message: Label for region not defined
checks.repair_technique: Reference a visible label with aria-labelledby

checks.error_message: Fieldset should not be used for visual presentation purpose only
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the fieldset contains input fields that are grouped together and is not used for visual purpose only

checks.error_message: Fieldset is missing legend
checks.repair_technique: Add a legend to the fieldset

checks.error_message: Fieldset contains blank legend
checks.repair_technique: Add meaningful text to the legend in the fieldset

checks.error_message: Duplicate access key
checks.repair_technique: accesskey attribute for each element should be unique

checks.error_message: Blank name attribute
checks.repair_technique: Provide a value to the name attribute of the element

checks.error_message: Invalid name attribute
checks.repair_technique: name attribute must begin with a letter ( A-Z or a-z ) or underscore ( _ ) and may be followed by any number of letters, digits ( 0-9 ), hyphens ("-"), underscores ("_"), colons (":"), and periods (".")

checks.error_message: Blank id attribute
checks.repair_technique: Provide a value to the id attribute of the element

checks.error_message: Duplicate id attribute
checks.repair_technique: Provide a unique value to the id attribute of the element; that has not been used by another element on the page

checks.error_message: Invalid id attribute
checks.repair_technique: id attribute should not contain any space characters

checks.error_message: More than one banner exist in the document or application
checks.repair_technique: Mark only one of the element with the banner role in the document or application

checks.error_message: More than one contentinfo exist in the document or application
checks.repair_technique: Mark only one of the element with the contentinfo role in the document or application

checks.error_message: More than one main region exist in the document or application
checks.repair_technique: Mark only one of the element with the main role in the document or application

checks.error_message: aria-required or aria-readonly used in columnheader
checks.repair_technique: Do not use aria-required or aria-readonly in a columnheader that descends from a table

checks.error_message: Dialog label is blank
checks.repair_technique: Provide a value to the aria-label attribute

checks.error_message: Unnecessary usage of aria heading
checks.repair_technique: Use native HTML heading for levels 1 to 6

checks.error_message: Minimum value of progressbar not defined
checks.repair_technique: Use aria-valuemin to define the minimum value

checks.error_message: Maximum value of progressbar not defined
checks.repair_technique: Use aria-valuemax to define the maximum value

checks.error_message: Current value of progressbar not defined
checks.repair_technique: Unless the value is indeterminate, use aria-valuenow to define the current value

checks.error_message: Label element for region is missing
checks.repair_technique: Make sure that the visible label referenced with aria-labelledby exists on the page

checks.error_message: Label element for region is not a heading
checks.repair_technique: Include the label inside of a heading whenever possible

checks.error_message: Tooltip not referenced
checks.repair_technique: Elements with the role tooltip should be referenced through the use of aria-describedby before or at the time the tooltip is displayed.

checks.error_message: More than one element marked with aria-current
checks.repair_technique: Only mark one element in a set of elements as current with aria-current.

checks.error_message: Content is hidden
checks.repair_technique: Ensure the content is not hidden and is included in a container that exposes the content to the user

checks.error_message: Missing aria-invalid
checks.repair_technique: Use aria-invalid in conjunction with aria-errormessage

checks.error_message: Element is missing label reference
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid reference in aria-labelledby attribute or remove it if not required

checks.error_message: Element used as label reference does not exist
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid reference in aria-labelledby attribute or remove it if not required

checks.error_message: aria-selected not specified
checks.repair_technique: Ensure that selected descendants have the aria-selected attribute set to true, and selectable descendant have the aria-selected attribute set to false.

checks.error_message: aria-owns used for DOM descendant
checks.repair_technique: Do not use aria-owns as a replacement for the DOM hierarchy. If the relationship is represented in the DOM, do not use aria-owns.

checks.error_message: Max value is less than Min value
checks.repair_technique: Ensure the value of aria-valuemax is greater than or equal to the value of aria-valuemin.

checks.error_message: Min value is greater than Max value
checks.repair_technique: Ensure the value of aria-valuemin is less than or equal to the value of aria-valuemax.

checks.error_message: aria-valuenow is not a decimal number
checks.repair_technique: The value of aria-valuenow should be a decimal number.

checks.error_message: ARIA roles are not supported by element
checks.repair_technique: Remove the ARIA role applied on element

checks.error_message: Role applied is implicit to the element
checks.repair_technique: Remove the ARIA role applied on element

checks.error_message: Applied role is not allowed on element
checks.repair_technique: Remove the applied roles and apply the appropriate roles on the element

checks.error_message: ARIA attributes are not supported by element
checks.repair_technique: Remove the ARIA attributes applied on element

checks.error_message: Applied attribute is not allowed on element
checks.repair_technique: Use the attributes that are allowed on element

checks.error_message: Required ARIA attributes are missing on element
checks.repair_technique: Apply the following missing attributes

checks.error_message: Noframes not specified
checks.repair_technique: Add a noframes section to the frameset

checks.error_message: Missing title attribute
checks.repair_technique: Add a title attribute to the frame

checks.error_message: Blank title
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the title attribute

checks.error_message: Title attribute has placeholder text
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the title attribute that describes the purpose of the frame

checks.error_message: Frame title text is short
checks.repair_technique: Check that the frame title is valid

checks.error_message: Frame title text is verbose
checks.repair_technique: Check that the frame title is valid

checks.error_message: iframe does not have alternate content
checks.repair_technique: Provide alternate content in iframe body

checks.error_message: Duplicate frame title
checks.repair_technique: Provide a unique title to the frame that describes its purpose

checks.error_message: Frame title is same as it page name
checks.repair_technique: Provide a valid text to the title attribute that describes the purpose of the frame

checks.error_message: Blank noframes
checks.repair_technique: Add meaningful text to the noframes section

checks.error_message: iframe may require a title
checks.repair_technique: Check if a title attribute is required for the iframe

checks.error_message: Thumb icon not marked with slider role
checks.repair_technique: Provide role=slider for the slider thumb

checks.error_message: Minimum value of slider not defined
checks.repair_technique: Define the minimum value using aria-valuemin attribute

checks.error_message: Maximum value of slider not defined
checks.repair_technique: Define the maximum value using aria-valuemax attribute

checks.error_message: Current value of slider not available
checks.repair_technique: Define the current value using aria-valuenow or aria-valuetext attribute

checks.error_message: Menubar not marked with menubar role
checks.repair_technique: Provide role=menu or role=menubar for the main menu

checks.error_message: Items in menu not marked with menuitem role
checks.repair_technique: Provide role=menuitem for the items in menu

checks.error_message: Menu items containing submenus not have aria-haspopup defined
checks.repair_technique: Define the popup state by setting aria-haspopup=true

checks.error_message: Tree not marked with tree role
checks.repair_technique: Provide role=tree for the tree

checks.error_message: Items in tree not marked with treeitem role
checks.repair_technique: Provide role=treeitem for the items in tree

checks.error_message: One or more elements do not have an accessible name
checks.repair_technique: Please provide an accessible name using aria-label, aria-labelledby, or native markup

checks.error_message: One or more expandable/collapsible sub-trees not marked with group role
checks.repair_technique: All sub-trees should be marked with role=group

checks.error_message: Expanded/Collapsed state of one or more treeitems not defined
checks.repair_technique: Mark the tree-items containing sub-trees with aria-expanded with value set to true or false as per the expanded state of the sub-tree

checks.error_message: One or more elements do not have an accessible name
checks.repair_technique: Please provide an accessible name using aria-label, aria-labelledby, or native markup

checks.error_message: Datepicker grid not marked with grid role
checks.repair_technique: Mark the datepicker grid with role=grid

checks.error_message: One or more datepicker grid rows not marked with row role
checks.repair_technique: Mark the datepicker grid rows with role=row

checks.error_message: One or more datepicker grid cells not marked with gridcell role
checks.repair_technique: Mark the datepicker grid cells with role=gridcell

checks.error_message: Role of one or more control not available programmatically in the datepicker
checks.repair_technique: Provide appropriate role to each control that is not a part of standard HTML markup

checks.error_message: Selected state for one or more gridcells not defined in the datepicker
checks.repair_technique: Gridcell elements that can be selected should be marked with aria-selected, the value of which depends on its selected state

checks.error_message: Pause/stop/hide control does not have an accessible name
checks.repair_technique: Please provide an accessible name using aria-label, aria-labelledby, or native markup

checks.error_message: Role for pause/stop/hide control is not available
checks.repair_technique: Provide appropriate role to each control that is not a part of standard HTML markup

checks.error_message: Appropriate role not defined
checks.repair_technique: Provide a role to the element accroding to the action it performs
